questions.duration: How long have you had a fever?
questions.temperature: What is the highest temperature you've recorded?
questions.pattern: Is the fever constant or does it come and go?
questions.associated_symptoms: Do you have any other symptoms like headache, stiff neck, rash, confusion, or difficulty breathing?
questions.recent_travel: Have you traveled recently or been exposed to anyone who is sick?
questions.immune_status: Do you have any conditions that affect your immune system, or are you on immunosuppressive medications?

triage_rules.expression: ('stiff neck' in str(associated_symptoms).lower() or 'confusion' in str(associated_symptoms).lower() or 'rash' in str(associated_symptoms).lower())
triage_rules.reason: Possible Meningitis or Sepsis - Immediate Emergency Care Required
Fever in immunocompromised patient - Urgent evaluation needed
Fever with respiratory symptoms - Medical evaluation recommended
